summary: This is a travel booking confirmation email for Alexander Bittner Rossmiller, arranging a hotel stay at The Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills, CA from February 25-29, 2020. The email was sent from a CWTSatoTravel account to a US Attorney's Office email address, suggesting this travel may be related to official business or a case.

keyFacts: Travel arrangements for Alexander Bittner Rossmiller were booked through the official government travel agency CWTSatoTravel.
The booking confirmation was sent to email addresses at the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), suggesting the travel was for official government business.
Rossmiller's New York residential address is listed as 31 West 8th Street, Apartment 3, New York, NY 10011.
The hotel stay was scheduled for February 25-29, 2020, at The Beverly Hilton in Beverly Hills, CA.
The document originates from the Epstein case files, indicating Rossmiller's travel may be connected to the investigation or related legal proceedings.
